channel.title: Rendering on Blue Visual v03
channel.description: Recent content in Rendering on Blue Visual v03

item.title: Happy Hip Helper
item.description: The Happy Hip Helper is a simple tool for assisting physical therapy patients with strengthening and exercising their hip muscles and regaining proper mobility.

item.title: Guardiome
item.description: Guardiome is a genomics company that gives people easy access to their genome. I worked with them to design branding, the website and its graphics, product renders, and much more. I am now the Chief Creative Officer at Guardiome.
